content.text: Match ends, Sassuolo 0, KRC Genk 2.
Second Half ends, Sassuolo 0, KRC Genk 2.
Attempt missed. Mbwana Aly Samatta (KRC Genk) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Paolo Sabak following a fast break.
Foul by Francesco Magnanelli (Sassuolo).
Wilfred Ndidi (KRC Genk) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, KRC Genk. Paolo Sabak replaces Nikolaos Karelis.
Luca Mazzitelli (Sassuolo) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Leandro Trossard (KRC Genk) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Goal!  Sassuolo 0, KRC Genk 2. Leandro Trossard (KRC Genk) left footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Nikolaos Karelis.
